physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 6 x 8 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''Allied - Women meet at 200 S. Grape; Mar 24. 71; Front L. to R.; Mrs. Sidney Schwartz, Mrs. Bexi Rosenberg, Mrs. Morris Rutland, Mrs. Sam Sugarman, Mrs. Ann Iskow; Back L. to R. Mrs. Herman Berman, Mrs. Leonard Litron, Mrs. Marshall Freedman, Mrs. Leonard Silverberg, ___ ? Lesser? (Hostess?).''

mods.abstract: Ten women, members of the Allied Jewish Federation, pose together at an Allied event at 200 S. Grape St. Front row left to right Mrs. Sidney Schwartz (Florence), Mrs. Bexi Rosenberg, Mrs. Morris Rutland (Juanita), Mrs. Sam Sugarman, Mrs. Ann Iskow and back row left to right Mrs. Herman Berman (Mabel), Mrs. Leonard Litron, Mrs. Marshall Freedman, Mrs. Leonard Silverberg, and an unidentified woman, possibly the hostess.
